name: wildbit/postmark-client
description: The officially supported client for Postmark (http://postmarkapp.com)

scripts.document: mkdir -p docs && mkdir -p docs/Postmark && rm -r docs/Postmark && ./vendor/bin/sphpdox process --output="./docs" Postmark src/Postmark
scripts.phpdoc: mkdir -p docs && mkdir -p docs/_static && rm -r docs/_static && ./vendor/bin/phpdoc --defaultpackagename=Postmark-PHP --template="./docs/_template" -t "./docs/_static/" -d "./src/"
